title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisites: IM21003 Operations Research-ILaboratory: Development and testing of simulation models for IE functional systems. Use of discrete and continuous simulation packages. Design, fabrication and experiment with simulators for skill, design, development and experiment with Simulation Games.
